mapper.select: select t1.blog_subject_id ,t1.subject_name ,t1.create_date,t1.synopsis ,t2.author_id ,t2.username ,t2.nickname ,t4.blog_id ,t4.title ,t4.create_date from dts_blog_subject t1 inner join uts_author t2 on t2.author_id = t1.author_id and t1.blog_subject_id = #{blogSubjectId} inner join dts_blog_subject_relation t3 on t3.blog_subject_id = t1.blog_subject_id inner join dts_blog t4 on t4.blog_id = t3.blog_id
select * from dts_blog_subject t1 inner join uts_author t2 on t2.author_id = t1.author_id
select * from dts_blog_subject t1 left join uts_author t2 on t1.author_id = t2.author_id where t2.username = #{username}
select t1.subject_name from dts_blog_subject t1 left join uts_author t2 on t1.author_id = t2.author_id where t2.subject_name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
